required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Design of an Integrative Algorithm for Staging Tuberculosis
clinical_study.official_title: Design of an Integrative Algorithm for Staging Tuberculosis to Improve Clinical Management.

lead_sponsor.agency: Fundació Institut Germans Trias i Pujol

clinical_study.source: Fundació Institut Germans Trias i Pujol

brief_summary.textblock: Tuberculosis is a chronic infectious disease that affects 10 million people, 300 in the city of Barcelona, every year. With serious consequences at public health level, it is associated with other diseases, and generated and influenced by many social and psychological factors. This study aims to stage tuberculosis disease by an integrative approach.

detailed_description.textblock: Tuberculosis is a chronic infectious disease that affects 10 million people, there are 300 new cases 300 in the city of Barcelona, every year. Tuberculosis has serious consequences at public health level. It is associated with other diseases, and generated and influenced by many social and psychological factors. This study aims to stage tuberculosis disease by a novel integrative approach.

primary_outcome.time_frame: timepoints 0 (at inclusion), at month 2 and month 6 (and month 12 if MDR/XDR)
timepoints 0 (at inclusion), at month 2 and month 6 (and month 12 if MDR/XDR)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: timepoints 0 (at inclusion), at month 2 and month 6 (and month 12 if MDR/XDR)
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in the biomarkers along time assessed by using analyzing parameters in blood and urine samples (by ELISA and LUMINEX)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: timepoints 0 (at inclusion), at month 2 and month 6 (and month 12 if MDR/XDR)
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in the BCN-SA Radiological Score Value. This Score assesses the sum of acute and chronic findings in the chest X-ray. Per each finding, a maximum score of 8 is recorded. The total score value is calculated by adding all the individual findings score values. Higher values of total score represent a worse outcome.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: timepoints 0 (at inclusion), at month 2 and month 6 (and month 12 if MDR/XDR)
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in Health Quality of Life measures along time assessed by using the Saint George's Respiratory Questionnaire (SGRQ, numeric score). It measures 3 subscales (symptoms/activity/impacts) and The Total score is calculated by summing all positive responses in the questionnaire and expressing the result as a percentage of the total weight for the questionnaire. Higher values represent a worse outcome.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: timepoints 0 (at inclusion), at month 2 and month 6 (and month 12 if MDR/XDR)
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in Health Quality of Life measures along time assessed by using the questionnaire Kessler-10 (K10, numeric score). Higher values represent a worse outcome.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in Health Quality of Life measures along time using BCN-Q questionnaire
secondary_outcome.time_frame: timepoints 0 (at inclusion), at month 2 and month 6 (and month 12 if MDR/XDR)
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in Health Quality of Life measures along time using BCN-Q questionnaire (descriptive questionnaire).

arm_group.description: TB patients diagnosed and followed-up in Barcelona, at the following Hospitals/Clinics: Servicios Clínicos, Hospital Universitari Germans Trias i Pujol, Hospital Universitari Vall d'Hebron-Drassanes, Hospital del Mar.

biospec_descr.textblock: Bloood samples for determination of DNA

study_pop.textblock: TB patients which clinical management is done at the following clinical centers: Servicios Clínicos, Hospital Universitari Vall d'Hebron-Drassanes or Hospital Universitari Germans Trias i Pujol.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- TB diagnosis (all forms), microbiologically confirmed (by AFB+, GenXpert+ or Culture+)
- Clinical management of the patients being done at Servicios Clínicos, Hospital Universitari Vall d'Hebron-Drassanes or Hospital Universitari Germans Trias i Pujol.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Not consenting to data/samples donation

overall_official.affiliation: Fundació Institut Germans Trias i Pujol

facility.name: Hospital Universitari Germans Trias i Pujol

link.description: This is the web site of the research group

results_reference.citation: Pujol-Cruells A, Vilaplana C. Specific Interventions for Implementing a Patient-Centered Approach to TB Care in Low-Incidence Cities. Front Med (Lausanne). 2019 Nov 26;6:273. doi: 10.3389/fmed.2019.00273. eCollection 2019.

patient_data.ipd_description: IPD that underlie results in a publication might be shared with other researchers
